src_original: syād yathâpi nāma bhagavan yadā mahāsāgaraḥ pratisaṃtiṣṭhate tadā nimne pṛthivīpradeśe saṃtiṣṭhate /
tasya nimnatvād alpakṛcchreṇa sarvanadyaś ca sarvapraśravaṇāni ca prapatanti /
evam eva bhagavan nirmānasya gurudakṣiṇīyagauravasya bodhisatvasyâlpakṛcchreṇa tāni gambhīrāṇi dharmasukhāni śro-  [ Cambridge MS f75a ---> ]  têndriyasyâbhāsam āgacchanti /
